product_name: Planet Bike Lunar Levers with Patch Kit
long_description: These ergonomically designed Planet Bike tire levers are super strong and the snap-together design fits compactly inside your seat bag. Tails hook against spokes and a wide nose with rim groove helps to easily pry off tires. Includes four Scab(TM) patches and an abrading square.
short_description: These ergonomically designed Planet Bike tire levers are super strong and the snap-together design fits compactly inside your seat bag.
